snippet.title: REPOSE | Publisher Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist REPOSE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3002510/REPOSE/ 

REPOSE is a tense and surreal horror game where each step, shot and mistake costs precious energy, rendered entirely in black and white.

Playing an early build of Repose was very eerie and figuring out how to make it to the next area with the limited energy you have was very rewarding. I’m so glad we are able to support the developer in the amazing game! Learning about the environment and the…. Wonderful company! Yep! They always care about you and your well being. They definitely don’t have an issue of people dying on the job…
